A smaller version of the [[Tailed Beast Ball]] that has been infused with [[lightning]] chakra which [[Killer B]] or the [[Eight-Tails]] can use to bring down a target's defences and inflict major damage. 

The attack also does not require time to be formed like the regular Tailed Beast Ball.

== Trivia ==
* As with many of the techniques of [[Kumogakure]] [[shinobi]], this technique has an English name given kanji that somewhat match the pronunciation.
